title: Colorado Firm Recalls Frozen Chicken and Steak Fajita Products Due to Misbranding
summary: WASHINGTON, Oct 13, 2011 - Phil’s Fresh Foods, Inc., a Boulder, Colo., establishment is recalling approximately 15,760 pounds of frozen chicken and steak fajita products due to misbranding, as the chicken fajita packages may contain steak, and the steak fajita packages may contain chicken, the...
impacted_products: 7-oz. cartons of “EVOL. BURRITOS FIRE GRILLED CHICKEN FAJITA.”
7-oz. cartons of “EVOL. BURRITOS FIRE GRILLED STEAK FAJITA.”
